0011011000001000 1111000111101111 0 -> sum: 0010011111110111, cout: 1

1000111000011011 1101011111000011 0 -> sum: 0110010111011110, cout: 1
1010001100101010 1000000001100101 1 -> sum: 0010001110010000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
